document_data.name: Jaxsen
document_data.mainbody: '''Jaxsen''' was a [[sorcerer]] member of the [[Xanathar's Thieves' Guild]] in [[Waterdeep]] in [[1375 DR]].
document_data.Activities: Usually Jaxsen lived inside the [[Yawning Portal]] inn, keeping an eye over all the adventurers attracted by the dying message of [[Halaster Blackcloak]].
document_data.Personality: Jaxsen worshiped an evil god and joined the Xanathar's Guild because saw the [[beholder]] crime lord as the ultimate tyrant.
document_data.Relationship: Jaxsen had an [[eyeball]] familiar called [[Xiv]], which he used to keep in contact with the other Guild members. Xiv was regularly under an ''[[invisibility]]'' spell.
